docs.text: .md-content ul { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; } .md-content ul li { width: 220px; } Site Overview 2 ¶ 更新情報 ・テーマを春っぽくしました (2018.3.20) ・ ABC の図を追加 (2017.8.20) ・ C の文章を加筆 (2017.2.10) ・ B を修正 (2014.7.12) ・ A を更新 (2011.8.10) Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. 日本語のテスト ¶ こんな風に日本語も入れることができるね！

docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . one two three Ctrl + Alt + Del Grouping code blocks ¶ Bash #!/bin/bash echo "Hello world!" C #include <stdio.h> int main ( void ) { printf ( "Hello world! \n " ); } C++ #include <iostream> int main () { std :: cout << "Hello world!" << std :: endl ; return 0 ; } C# using System ; class Program { static void Main ( string [] args ) { Console . WriteLine ( "Hello world!" ); } } Highlighting specific lines ¶ """ Bubble sort """ def bubble_sort ( items ): for i in range ( len ( items )): for j in range ( len ( items ) - 1 - i ): if items [ j ] > items [ j + 1 ]: items [ j ], items [ j + 1 ] = items [ j + 1 ], items [ j ] MathJax ¶ \frac{n!}{k!(n-k)!} = \binom{n}{k} \frac{n!}{k!(n-k)!} = \binom{n}{k} Caret ¶ This is the Caret . Tilde ¶ text has gone . Fontawesome ¶ Define list ¶ 定義 foobar
